vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to be smeared over, be blinded
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to be smeared over, be blinded
1a2) to smear eyes shut
1b) (Hiphil) to besmear (of eyes), smear over eyes
1c) (Hithpalpel) to blind oneself, be blinded
§ 1) to be smeared over, be blinded
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to be smeared over, be blinded
1a2) to smear eyes shut
1b) (Hiphil) to besmear (of eyes), smear over eyes
1c) (Hithpalpel) to blind oneself, be blinded
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 被塗上, 被蒙蔽
1a) (Qal) 眼睛被蒙敝
1b) (Hiphil) 被抹髒(眼睛), 眼睛被遮住
1c) (Hithpalpel) 使自己蒙蔽 #賽 29:9|
2) 玩耍, 在某事上高興
2a) (Pilpel) 玩耍, 歡喜, 使之愉悅
2b) (Palpal) 被愛撫 #賽 66:12|
2c) (Hithpalpel) 使自己高興 #詩 119:47|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 被涂上, 被蒙蔽
1a) (Qal) 眼睛被蒙敝
1b) (Hiphil) 被抹脏(眼睛), 眼睛被遮住
1c) (Hithpalpel) 使自己蒙蔽 #赛 29:9|
2) 玩耍, 在某事上高兴
2a) (Pilpel) 玩耍, 欢喜, 使之愉悦
2b) (Palpal) 被爱抚 #赛 66:12|
2c) (Hithpalpel) 使自己高兴 #诗 119:47|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to sport, take delight in
1a) (Pilpel) to sport, delight in, take delight in, delight oneself
1b) (Palpal) to be fondled
1c) (Hithpalpel) to delight oneself

1b) (Palpal) to be fondled

vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   estar adherido, pegado; (b) pilp.   deleitar; (c) pilp.pass.   ser acariciado, consentido; (d) hitpalp.   deleitarse; (e)   estar adherido, pegado; (f) hif.   pegar, adherir
